channel.title: New games
channel.description:
Ok so I need some new games for the pc.
I can't find anything new so I'm asking you guys; what pc game(s) should I get?
My price range is anywhere up to $100
I'm mainly looking for rts's but you can throw a few fps's if you'd like.
Edit: whoops forgot I had another topic :s
Oh well lets make this topic 2009 games +
(Is it worth waiting for call of duty modern warfare 2?)

item.title: New games
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“abraham2119, post:18, topic:302672”]why on earth would someone spend money on buying a game

ITS CALLED A TORRENT ffs[/quote]
uno if you always torrent they get no cash, they get no cash they dont make games. moron. If torrent and like it buy it if you dont like it then dont buy it simple

item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:16, topic:302672”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=398970.msg2961216#msg2961216 date=1253221273]

Hey does anyone know of a game that you can build your own shops and run your own business and things along the line of that? I’d find it really interesting
[/quote]The infinite amount of Tycoon games or if you’re into mmorpg’s (managing a business in-game for others to enjoy): Wurm Online, Mortal Online, Ultima Online, Second Life, etc etc etc

nooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo dont dont dont dont dont play wurm =[ its bad for health please dont…[/quote] =(
